home.description: Professional tattoo studio in Chișinău. We make quality and honest tattoos. We'll tell you the price right away, create a 3D visualization before starting, help with aftercare. Individual approach to each client.

individual.title: Individual approach
individual.text: We work with only one person per day. No one else, just you and the master. Full concentration on your tattoo, without rush and distractions. Comfortable atmosphere for creating the perfect work.

visualization.title: Visualization before starting
visualization.text: We'll create a 3D visualization and show you how the tattoo will look on your body. You can change something, adjust the size, color or placement before starting work. No surprises.

pricing.title: Transparent pricing
pricing.text: We'll tell you the exact price in euros (€) before starting work. No hidden fees, surcharges or surprises. Everything is honest and transparent.

consultation.label: CONSULTATION AND PREPARATION
items: Write to us on Telegram or Instagram
Show us pictures, ideas or sketches you like
We'll discuss style, size, placement and details
We'll create a 3D visualization of the future tattoo
We'll approve the final sketch and price
We'll schedule for a time convenient for you

process.label: APPLICATION PROCESS
items: Pleasant and relaxing atmosphere in the studio
Everything is sterile, clean and safe (disposable needles, gloves)
We'll play music you love or silence
You can watch series, read or just relax

aftercare.label: AFTERCARE AND SUPPORT
items: We'll take professional photos of the finished work
I'll give you detailed aftercare instructions
We'll provide all necessary healing products
We'll check how it's healing after 1 week (online)
We'll check the result after 4 weeks (in studio)
Free correction if needed (within a month)

styles.description: Familiarize yourself with different tattoo styles. The images presented serve as visual examples for understanding the characteristics of each style and are not the master's works.

modal.disclaimer: The images presented serve as visual examples for understanding the characteristics of each style and are not the master's works.

feed.title: Our works
feed.description: See examples of our works on Instagram. We make tattoos in different styles: from minimalism to realism, from classic to modern art. Each work is unique and created specifically for the client.

booking.title: Contact us
booking.description: Write to us directly on Telegram, Viber, WhatsApp or Instagram. We'll respond within 24 hours and discuss all the details of your future tattoo.
